props.allowedHours: Restricts which hours can be selected
props.allowedMinutes: Restricts which minutes can be selected
props.allowedSeconds: Restricts which seconds can be selected
props.amPmInTitle: Place AM/PM switch in title, not near the clock.
props.format: Defines the format of a time displayed in picker. Available options are **ampm** and **24hr**.
props.headerColor: Defines the header color. If not specified it will use the color defined by `Color` prop or the default picker color
props.scrollable: Allows changing hour/minute with mouse scroll
props.useSeconds: Toggles the use of seconds in picker

events.onChange: Emitted when user selects the hour
events.onPeriodUpdate: Emitted when user clicks the AM/PM button

contents.childContent: Displayed below the clock, can be used for example for adding action button (**OK** and **Cancel**).
